text:
@Alyssa_Milano Ok so.....

Science dictates Coronavirus has become Controlavirus.

Fact is you’ve cause much harm to humankind.

Truth is...@JoeBiden is a predator of young girls, and you’ve stayed silent bcs you’re a @MeToo fraud and political opportunist.
